message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, let's try for more!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much more!
You're not giving up enough, I'll take a bit more!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting everything!
I'm not backing down, this is my best offer so far!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a bit more. Don't expect it to last!
I'm taking control, this is my last chance to get a good deal!

This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
